data.comment: In the minute 0, The match has been interrupted.
Today's referee, Ryuji Sato, has blown to start the match.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Oita have a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Ryuji Sato awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Kenta Nishizawa's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 17, Shimizu pushes forward through Elsinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 20, Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Oita's area.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Oita needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Yusuke Goto hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Shimizu!
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Yusuke Goto (Shimizu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 34, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shimizu's Valdo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Oita defender.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 41, Hwang Seok-Ho heads in to make it 1-0 at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kenta Nishizawa with an assist there.
Ryuji Sato signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 45, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Shizuoka.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a first substitution, with Daiki Watari replacing Kazuki Kozuka.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Carlinhos Junior.
Great play from Renato Augusto to set up the goal.
In the minute 59, Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 61, In Shizuoka Shimizu drive forward through Kenta Nishizawa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Yuya Takazawa is replacing Tatsuya Tanaka for Oita at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Oita are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Oita.
In the minute 67, Tomohiro Katanosaka is making the team's fourth substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Yuta Koide replacing Kaoru Takayama.
The away team have replaced Toshio Shimakawa with Yushi Hasegawa. This is the second substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
In the minute 67, Oita make their third substitution with Yuto Misao replacing Yuki Kagawa.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 68, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 70, Yugo Tatsuta heads in to give Shimizu a 3-0 lead at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
That's a fine assist from Kenta Nishizawa.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Ryuji Sato awards Oita a goal kick.
Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a first substitution, with Keita Nakamura replacing Yusuke Goto.
Ryuji Sato signals a Oita throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu drives forward and Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Oita's Kei Chinen breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 76, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Shimizu.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 77, Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu's Keita Nakamura gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 81, Oita drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In the minute 83, Can Shimizu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal! Shimizu extend their lead to 4-0 thanks to a Valdo header.
Kenta Nishizawa instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 86, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Kei Chinen strikes to reduce the deficit to 4-1 at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Great play from Yuta Koide to set up the goal.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Kenta Nishizawa with Yuito Suzuki.
Yuya Takazawa keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 4-2.
Kei Chinen with an assist there.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Shizuoka.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Ryuji Sato signals a Shimizu throw-in in Oita's half.
Oita have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Shizuoka. The final score is 4-2.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Teerasil Dangda replacing Shota Kaneko.
